mapper.select: SELECT * from edu_course t where t.id = #{courseId}#

SELECT c.title, c.cover, c.price, t.name as teacherName, c.lesson_num, s.title as subjectLevelOne, s1.title as subjectLevelTwo FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s ON c.subject_parent_id = s.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_id = s1.id where c.id = #{courseId}#
